effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.black-white: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
